Articles.Content:
Just make the fairings able to clip through parts and a key to end an unfinished fairing.

Edited February 17, 2020 by Random Annoying Guy
That would be very nice. Its always annoying when i have to remove and replace parts to add a faring.
Yeah, a nice little toggle to switch between clippable and non-clippable fairings would be nice. It could be under advanced tweakables.

yesssss!!! Fairings hate decouplers! They hate any part above them if it bulges more than a few micrometers. They also hate it when you have a fairing! They literally clip with themselves! my 100% support for all three posts!
